title: Gently down the stream
creator_credit: Ray Costello and Education Department Western Australia
brief_description: Shows a Year 10 canoeing expedition on the river from Mt Franklin to the Noralup inlet, Western Australia. Demonstrates that the focus of the Outdoor Education Project is preparation for expeditions; and shows the basic understandings for wilderness and adventure activities.
creator_credit_for_label: Ray Costello and Education Department Western Australia
description: Shows a Year 10 canoeing expedition on the river from Mt Franklin to the Noralup inlet, Western Australia. Demonstrates that the focus of the Outdoor Education Project is preparation for expeditions; and shows the basic understandings for wilderness and adventure activities.
